effect_entries.effect:
Switches the target out for another of its trainer's Pokémon selected at random.  Wild battles end immediately.

Doesn't affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect_entries.short_effect: Immediately ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
Scares wild foes
to end battle.

Scares wild foes
to end battle.

Makes the foe flee to end
the battle.

Makes the foe flee to end
the battle.

The foe is made to
switch out with an
ally. In the wild,
the battle ends.

The foe is scared off,
to be replaced by
another Pokémon in
its party. In the
wild, the battle ends.

The foe is scared off,
to be replaced by
another Pokémon in
its party. In the
wild, the battle ends.

The foe is scared off,
to be replaced by
another Pokémon in
its party. In the
wild, the battle ends.

Effraie le Pokémon ennemi et
le remplace par un autre. Dans
la nature, met fin au combat.

The target is scared off and replaced by
another Pokémon in its party. In the
wild, the battle ends.

The target is scared off and switched.
In the wild, a battle against a single
Pokémon ends.

あいてを　にがして
ひかえの　ポケモンを　ひきずりだす。
やせいの　ばあいは　せんとうが　おわる。

상대를 도망가게 해서
교대할 포켓몬을 끌어낸다.
야생의 경우에는 배틀이 끝난다.

Effraie le Pokémon ennemi et le remplace par un
autre. Dans la nature, met fin au combat.

Verjagt das Ziel und ersetzt es durch ein anderes
Pokémon. Beendet den Kampf in der Wildnis.

Se lleva al objetivo, que es cambiado por otro
Pokémon. Si es un Pokémon salvaje, acaba el
combate.

Il bersaglio lascia il campo e viene sostituito.
Mette fine alle lotte contro singoli Pokémon
selvatici.

The target is scared off, and a different
Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild,
this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

相手を　逃がして
控えの　ポケモンを　ひきずりだす。
野生の　場合は　戦闘が　終わる。

あいてを　にがして
ひかえの　ポケモンを　ひきずりだす。

趕走對手，強制讓後備寶可夢上場。
對手為野生寶可夢時，戰鬥將直接結束。

un autre. Lors d’un combat contre un Pokémon
sauvage seul, met fin au combat.

战斗将直接结束。
